pullRequest.title: [FLINK-19669][coordination] PipelinedRegionSchedulingStrategy#init ResultPartitionType blocking check use isBlocking method
pullRequest.bodyText: PipelinedRegionSchedulingStrategy#init ResultPartitionType blocking check should use isBlocking method instead of checking of the enum type.

nodes.bodyText:
I prefer to not change the topology for existing tests and not change unrelated tests.
I think it's better to add a new case testSchedulingTopologyWithPersistentBlockingEdges() which initializes a PipelinedRegionSchedulingStrategy from a topology which contains BLOCKING_PERSISTENT results.

commit.message: [FLINK-19669][coordination] PipelinedRegionSchedulingStrategy#init ResultPartitionType blocking check use isBlocking method
